If you dislike the way it is given on the starts files or if the language you code isn't here

The following are the odds that a given letter is followed by another, e.g. line 36: 10.5% of the white-space are followed by an 'a', i.e. 10.5% of the words begin with 'a'
Note that white-space is used as end/begining of word so it includes punctuation marks.
